Terrorsaur:




Terrorsaur screeched, suddenly seeing Battera. He flapped his huge wings 
rapidly, hovering. His mouth gaped, showing many spiny teeth.

"Who am I?" he asked, still a little caught off guard. "Who are you?"


>From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
>Date: Tue, 27 Jun 2000 17:13:43 MDT
>
>
>::Battera::
>
>She looked up again and saw the huge red bird-like creature.  She wasn't
>sure what is was, but she wanted to check it out.  She flew up and became
>level with it.  She was sligtly behind it.  She moved forward and looked at
>it.  It looked like a huge flying lizard.
>"Hello there.  Who are you? If I may be so bold as to ask?"
